description.displayText: Liz volunteered with us often at a Recreation Center. She was helping us with various events throughout the years she was living in town.  We have always found her to be very reliable, hard working, takes direction well and was great with the children who attend our events.

We have always found her to be very reliable, hard working, takes direction well and was great with the children who attend our events.
